Detailed Description

Parameters of APSME-UPDATE-DEVICE.request primitive. See ZigBee Specification r19, 4.4.4.1, page 459.

Definition at line 86 of file apsmeUpdateDevice.h.

Field Documentation

ExtAddr_t APS_UpdateDeviceReq_t::destAddress

[LE] The extended 64-bit address of the device that shall be sent the update information.

Definition at line 98 of file apsmeUpdateDevice.h.

ExtAddr_t APS_UpdateDeviceReq_t::deviceAddress

[LE] The extended 64-bit address of the device whose status is being updated.

Definition at line 101 of file apsmeUpdateDevice.h.

void(* APS_UpdateDeviceReq_t::APS_UpdateDeviceConf)(APS_UpdateDeviceConf_t *conf)

Callback function pointer as a handler of corresponding confirm primitive. Must not be set to NULL.

Definition at line 104 of file apsmeUpdateDevice.h.

ShortAddr_t APS_UpdateDeviceReq_t::deviceShortAddress

[LE] The 16-bit network address of the device whose status is being updated.

Definition at line 107 of file apsmeUpdateDevice.h.

APS_UpdateDeviceStatus_t APS_UpdateDeviceReq_t::status

This parameter Indicates the updated status of the device given by the deviceAddress parameter.
